mapper.select: SELECT parking_id AS parkingId, parking_lot_id AS parkingLotId, member_id AS memberId, car_number AS carNumber, entrance_date AS entranceDate, exit_date AS exitDate, status FROM parking WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId}
mapper.update: UPDATE parking SET status = 'ENTRANCE' WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId}
mapper.select: SELECT p.car_number AS carNumber, s.name AS storeName, pl.name AS parkingLotName, p.entrance_date AS entranceDate, EXTRACT(DAY FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - p.entrance_date)) * 24 + EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - p.entrance_date)) AS parkingTimeHour, EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP-p.entrance_date) AS parkingTimeMinute, pl.per_price AS perPrice FROM member m INNER JOIN parking p ON m.member_id = p.member_id INNER JOIN parking_lot pl ON p.parking_lot_id = pl.parking_lot_id INNER JOIN store s ON pl.store_id = s.store_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.status = 'ENTRANCE' ORDER BY p.entrance_date ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT p.parking_id AS parkingId, s.name AS storeName, pl.name AS parkingLotName, p.car_number AS carNumber, p.entrance_date AS entranceDate, p.status FROM parking p INNER JOIN parking_lot pl ON p.parking_lot_id = pl.parking_lot_id INNER JOIN store s ON pl.store_id = s.store_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND deleted_date IS NULL
